synopsis.text: Yoshiki Maeda, a 17-year-old transfer student, finds himself in the prestigious Baramon High School, a private boys' school reserved for the prefecture's elite. As he navigates through his new environment, he encounters a diverse group of influential characters, including a rebellious teacher, a charismatic soccer captain, and a childhood friend he hasn't seen in seven years. Amidst the school's bustling atmosphere, Maeda will experience a whirlwind of friendship, love, and conflict, forever altering the course of his life. As the school gates open to a world of possibilities, the motto, 'Whenever you exited the school gates, you were handsome,' rings true for Maeda's transformative journey.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
